item.title: Why I started blogging
item.author: Lanhsin
item.description: I always thought about starting a blog. Now that I’ve finally done it, I want to share why. 1. Clearing My Mind Writing helps me think clearly. Itâ€™s like organizing a messy room. By writing down my ideas, I can make better sense of them. 2. Looking Back I’ve been through a lot in life and school. Writing about these times lets me think about them again. It helps me see things I might have missed before.
